name: Pug io (opoly)
description:
Pug io is like a trip through the pet store of your dreams! Choose your favorite Pugs and collect rent every time another player lands on your space. Create a fun strategic opoly-style board game while celebrating one of our worlds' most popular canines, ...pugs.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
